text:
@OregonGovBrown What is wrong with Oregon. It’s being taken over by both the coronavirus and federal police. How is it the feds can rule your streets w/o your permission? Have you gone to court? Are masks mandated statewide? What is your plan @OregonGovBrown ? 
#FascistTrump #KeepSchoolsClosed
